attributes.action: this government spent £9.000000 part of which was leaving the single market
attributes.additional_details: Leave the EU means borders closed no more immigrants , no more payments to the EU are own Laws . And no to the single market this government spent £9.000000 pounds of the tax payers money saying we would leave the single market if we voted to leave the EU and we voted to leave the EU and everything to do with the EU . No half cut or back doors
attributes.background: We were told by this government if we voted to leave the EU we would be leaving the single market that was part of the vote so we do NOT want to be in the single market or pay the EU anymore money we will take this to court if we have to do so

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the UK to leave the single market, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163162
